columns.name: replication_group_id
columns.description: The identifier for the replication group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The ARN (Amazon Resource Name) of the replication group.

columns.name: description
columns.description: The user supplied description of the replication group.

columns.name: at_rest_encryption_enabled
columns.description: A flag that enables encryption at-rest when set to true.

columns.name: kms_key_id
columns.description: The ID of the KMS key used to encrypt the disk in the cluster.

columns.name: auth_token_enabled
columns.description: A flag that enables using an AuthToken (password) when issuing Redis commands.

columns.name: auth_token_last_modified_date
columns.description: The date when the auth token was last modified.

columns.name: automatic_failover
columns.description: Indicates the status of automatic failover for this Redis replication group.

columns.name: cache_node_type
columns.description: The name of the compute and memory capacity node type for each node in the replication group.

columns.name: cluster_enabled
columns.description: A flag indicating whether or not this replication group is cluster enabled.

columns.name: multi_az
columns.description: A flag indicating if you have Multi-AZ enabled to enhance fault tolerance.

columns.name: snapshot_retention_limit
columns.description: The number of days for which ElastiCache retains automatic cluster snapshots before deleting them.

columns.name: snapshot_window
columns.description: The daily time range (in UTC) during which ElastiCache begins taking a daily snapshot of your node group (shard).

columns.name: snapshotting_cluster_id
columns.description: The cluster ID that is used as the daily snapshot source for the replication group.

columns.name: status
columns.description: The current state of this replication group - creating, available, modifying, deleting, create-failed, snapshotting.

columns.name: transit_encryption_enabled
columns.description: A flag that enables in-transit encryption when set to true.

columns.name: configuration_endpoint
columns.description: The configuration endpoint for this replication group.

columns.name: global_replication_group_info
columns.description: The name of the Global Datastore and role of this replication group in the Global Datastore.

columns.name: member_clusters
columns.description: The names of all the cache clusters that are part of this replication group.

columns.name: member_clusters_outpost_arns
columns.description: The outpost ARNs of the replication group's member clusters.

columns.name: node_groups
columns.description: A list of node groups in this replication group.

columns.name: pending_modified_values
columns.description: A group of settings to be applied to the replication group, either immediately or during the next maintenance window.

columns.name: user_group_ids
columns.description: The list of user group IDs that have access to the replication group.
